title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample, the application emits a beep sound.
EB: The application should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Launch the application with build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on the StylesSWT.SINGLE.
5. Click back on the StylesSWT.MULTI.
